News.Title: Apollo Sindoori Subsidiary Wins ₹23.48 Crore Contract
News.Summary: Apollo Sindoori Hotels subsidiary secures housekeeping services contract from IIT Madras worth ₹23.48 crore for February 2026 to March 2027 period.

News.Title: Apollo Sindoori Hotels Wins ₹64.31 Cr Work Orders
News.Summary: Apollo Sindoori Hotels' unit secures multiple facility management contracts worth ₹64.31 crores from Tata Main Hospital and Government of Rajasthan, with durations ranging from 1 to 33 months.

News.Title: Apollo Sindoori Hotels Reports Stable Q3 EBITDA, Slight Margin Decline
News.Summary: Apollo Sindoori Hotels has reported Q3 EBITDA of 56 million rupees, unchanged from the same period last year. However, the company's EBITDA margin decreased slightly from 4.41% to 4.16% year-over-year.

News.Title: Apollo Sindoori Hotels Reports Q3 Financial Results
News.Summary: Apollo Sindoori Hotels has announced its financial results for the third quarter. The company's consolidated net profit increased to 22 million rupees, up from 18 million rupees in the same period last year. Revenue for the quarter rose to 1.4 billion rupees, compared to 1.35 billion rupees in the previous year.
